inclusion.criterion: Urticaria +/- angioedema present for a minimum of 6 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age older than 8 years old, with no upper age limit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Causes such as parasite infestation, microbial and viral infections, autoimmune disease, or other pathology that could account for the U/A/P should be excluded
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Skin prick test and/or radioallergosorbent (RAST) test are negative for all food allergens tested, or patient had achieved no symptomatic improvement after strict avoidance of all skin test-positive foods
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who is taking central nervous system (CNS) acting agents (including tranquilizers, antidepressants, sedatives, hypnotics or antiepileptics) at any time
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of COPD and is using Duo-Neb inhaled q4 hr PRN. He smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
